Posts.Content: AH! The controversy about Vitamins? I always took High Potency Vitamin B 12 all my life...I am on no medications and never was I am 79Yrs,Old.….Cancer came and I just had the cancer tumor removed...…..None in Tissue or Lymph nodes! After I came home from surgery that week I was so Weak and Tired as I had lost 14 Pounds (I believe it was Stress Not eating but I just had blood work for Thyroid (Which I think I should have been on the past two years but no one thought to check it! )My physician told me she thought I was just not eating Enough Because $1,300 .00 worth of blood work should There was nothing wrong with me. (But they forgot to do the Thyroid)So today I had blood work done , Will know next week. Anyway I started taking my High Potency Vitamin B 12 and after 5 Days I am starting to have Energy and am feeling better, Maybe it is in my mind but its working for me.
Posts.Title: Still Tired Three Years After Breast Cancer Treatment

Posts.Content: Thank You Happy New Year and Good Health to All!
Posts.Title: Talking About it/Doesn't make it any Better!
